grailog.Viz

Class GenDot

  • java.lang.Object
    • grailog.Viz.GenDot

  • public class GenDot
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates the .dot file needed by graphviz. It reads the input data from the InputRules.txt text file. The generated .dot file will be saved on disk in the same directory as InputRules.txt with name output.["output format extension"].dot
    Author:
    Akbari

    • Method Detail

      • getObjects

        private java.lang.String[] getObjects(java.lang.String[][] bodies,
                            java.lang.String[][] heads)
        This method returns an array of the objects in the rule.
        Parameters:
        bodies - : this bodies array contains the body axioms of the input rule
        heads - : this bodies array contains the conclusion axioms of the input rule
        Returns:
        : returns an array of the objects in the rule.

      • isObject

        private boolean isObject(java.lang.String node)
        This method determines if a specified node is an object or not.
        Parameters:
        node - : a specified node in the graph
        Returns:
        : if the node is an object returns true, otherwise returns false.

      • genDotFile

        public void genDotFile(java.lang.String outformat)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method generates the input .dot file required by graphviz and save it to the disk. Then asks graphiz to use it as input and make the output file.
        Parameters:
        outformat - : is the output format that user likes to be generated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
